title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response only includes the first criterion below.
The response includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Econland’s purchases of foreign assets will increase and/or does not explain that Econland’s investors will seek higher returns in other countries, which increases Econland’s demand for foreign assets.

The response states that Econland’s purchases of foreign assets will increase and explains that Econland’s investors will seek higher returns in other countries, which increases Econland’s demand for foreign assets.
